Name: Automated Bid Management
description_c: Automatically adjusts keyword bids based on performance metrics and target CPA goals. Monitors conversion data and increases bids for high-performing keywords while reducing bids for underperformers.

Name: Campaign Performance Monitor
description_c: Sends daily email alerts for campaigns with significant performance changes. Tracks metrics like CTR, conversion rate, and cost changes to identify issues early.

Name: Ad Copy A/B Testing
description_c: Automates the creation and management of ad copy tests. Rotates ad variations, measures statistical significance, and pauses underperforming ads automatically.

Name: Budget Allocation Optimizer
description_c: Redistributes budget between campaigns based on performance and remaining monthly budget. Ensures high-performing campaigns don't run out of budget while limiting spend on poor performers.

Name: Keyword Bid Optimization
description_c: Advanced keyword bid optimization using machine learning principles. Analyzes historical performance, seasonality, and competitor activity to set optimal bids for maximum ROI.

Name: Competitor Research Automation
description_c: Automates competitive research by analyzing auction insights and search impression share data. Generates reports on competitor activity and market opportunities.

Name: Quality Score Tracker
description_c: Monitors keyword quality scores and provides recommendations for improvement. Tracks changes over time and alerts when quality scores drop significantly.

Name: Negative Keyword Harvesting
description_c: Automatically identifies and adds negative keywords based on search term reports. Helps reduce wasted spend on irrelevant traffic and improves campaign efficiency.

Name: Landing Page Monitor
description_c: Regularly checks landing page URLs for availability and load times. Pauses ads with broken landing pages and sends alerts to prevent wasted ad spend.

Name: Dayparting Automation
description_c: Automatically adjusts ad schedules and bid modifiers based on historical performance data. Optimizes campaigns to show ads during the most profitable hours and days.

Name: Account Health Checker
description_c: Comprehensive account audit script that checks for common issues like duplicate keywords, missing extensions, low-quality ads, and budget constraints. Generates detailed health reports.

Name: Conversion Tracking Validator
description_c: Validates conversion tracking setup across all campaigns. Checks for missing conversion actions, duplicate tracking, and provides recommendations for improving conversion measurement accuracy.
